issue.title: Programatically updating lights yields a false error

content.raw: I have determined that if I defer the dynamic creation of the lights, this gets rid of the 'light already exists' error. So, this leads me to believe that dynamic creation of the lights -- as a gazebo message -- cannot be done from within the plugin Load() callback. @iche033 is this expected behaviour?
content.html: I have determined that if I defer the dynamic creation of the lights, this gets rid of the 'light already exists' error. So, this leads me to believe that dynamic creation of the lights -- as a gazebo message -- cannot be done from within the plugin Load() callback. @iche033 is this expected behaviour?
